Class EdidUtil

oshi.util.EdidUtil
@ThreadSafe public final class EdidUtil extends Object
EDID parsing utility.

      public static byte[][] getDescriptors(byte[] edid)
      Get the VESA descriptors
      Parameters:
      edid - The EDID byte array
      Returns:

      Get the VESA descriptor type
      Parameters:
